com.paypal.selion.utils

Class ServletHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.paypal.selion.utils.ServletHelper

  • public final class ServletHelper
extends Object
    A utility class that basically helps in extracting information from Servlet request/responses also has the commonly repeated HTML code used for display purposes

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      ServletHelper()

      Utility method used to display a message when re-direction happens in the UI flow

      Helps retrieve the parameters and its values as a Map

    • Method Detail

      • getParameters

        public static Map<String,String> getParameters(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Helps retrieve the parameters and its values as a Map
        Parameters:
        request - - A HttpServletRequest that represents the request from which the parameters and their corresponding values are to be extracted.
        Returns:
        - A Map that represents the parameters and their values

      • displayMessageOnRedirect

        public static void displayMessageOnRedirect(PrintWriter writer,
                            String reDirectMessage)
        Utility method used to display a message when re-direction happens in the UI flow
        Parameters:
        writer - - The PrintWriter object that corresponds to a response
        reDirectMessage - - Message to display

      • loginToGrid

        public static void loginToGrid(PrintWriter writer,
               String messageToDisplay)
        Utility method to display the LoginPage for authenticating user
        Parameters:
        writer - - The PrintWriter object that corresponds to a response
        messageToDisplay - - Status message to be displayed
